title: Here's to your health: infectious diseases
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit, Craig Reardon and Robert Grant
brief_description: A program which deals with infectious diseases - what causes them, how to prevent catching them and what happens to us if we catch them.
